member.name: T:BH1745Driver.AdcGain
member.summary: Represents the available ADC gain options for the Bh1745.

member.name: F:BH1745Driver.AdcGain.X1
member.summary: Gain multiplier of 1.

member.name: F:BH1745Driver.AdcGain.X2
member.summary: Gain multiplier of 2.

member.name: F:BH1745Driver.AdcGain.X16
member.summary: Gain multiplier of 16.

member.name: T:BH1745Driver.Bh1745
member.summary: Digital color sensor Bh1745.

member.name: F:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.DefaultI2cAddress
member.summary: The primary I2c address of the BH1745

member.name: F:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.SecondaryI2cAddress
member.summary: The secondary I2c address of the BH1745

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.SoftwareReset
member.summary: Gets or sets the state of the software reset. True indicates that the initial reset is started, false that it is not started. On reset all registers are reset and the sensor goes to power down mode.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.InterruptReset
member.summary: Gets or sets the state of the interrupt pin. False is the default state in which the interrupt pin is not initialized (active). True is used to set the pin to high impedance (inactive).

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.MeasurementTime
member.summary: Gets or sets the currently set measurement time.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.MeasurementIsValid
member.summary: Gets whether the last measurement is valid.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.MeasurementIsActive
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the measurement is active.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.AdcGain
member.summary: Gets or sets the adc gain of the sensor.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.InterruptLatch
member.summary: Gets or sets the status of the interrupt signal. True indicates an active interrupt signal, false an inactive signal.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.InterruptLatch
member.summary: Gets or sets how the interrupt pin latches. False indicates that the interrupt pin is latched until interrupt register is read or initialized. True indicates that the pin is latched after each measurement.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.InterruptSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the source channel of the interrupt.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.InterruptIsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the interrupt pin is enabled.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.InterruptPersistence
member.summary: Gets or sets the persistence function of the interrupt.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.RedDataRegister
member.summary: Gets the data in the red data register.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.GreenDataRegister
member.summary: Gets the data in the green data register.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.BlueDataRegister
member.summary: Gets the data in the blue data register.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.ClearDataRegister
member.summary: Gets the data in the clear data register.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.DintDataRegister
member.summary: Gets the data in the dint data register. This register is used for internal calculation.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.LowerInterruptThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the lower interrupt threshold.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.HigherInterruptThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the higher interrupt threshold.

member.name: P:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.ChannelCompensationMultipliers
member.summary: Gets or sets the channel compensation multipliers which are used to compensate the measurements.

member.summary: Digital color sensor Bh1745.

member.name: M:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.Init
member.summary: Initializes the device.

member.summary: Gets the uncompensated color reading from the sensor.

member.name: M:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.GetCompensatedColor
member.summary: Gets the compensated color reading from the sensor.

member.name: M:BH1745Driver.Bh1745.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the Bh1745 resources.

member.summary: Color values measured from a Bh1745 sensor.

member.summary: Red color channel value.

member.summary: Green color channel value.

member.summary: Blue color channel value.

member.summary: Clear color channel value.

member.summary: RGBC value representing a color.

member.summary: Returns a BH1745Color scaled against the clear channel.

member.summary: Converts the Bh1745Color to a Color.

member.summary: Extension methods for the Bh1745 sensor.

member.summary: Converts the enum Measurement time to an integer representing the measurement time in ms.

member.summary: Multiplier for the red color channel.

member.summary: Multiplier for the green color channel.

member.summary: Multiplier for the blue color channel.

member.summary: Multiplier for the clear color channel.

member.name: T:BH1745Driver.InterruptPersistence
member.summary: Represents the configuration for the interrupt persistence functionality of the Bh1745.

member.name: F:BH1745Driver.InterruptPersistence.ToggleMeasurementEnd
member.summary: Interrupt status is toggled at each measurement end.

member.name: F:BH1745Driver.InterruptPersistence.UpdateMeasurementEnd
member.summary: Interrupt status is updated at each measurement end.

member.name: F:BH1745Driver.InterruptPersistence.UpdateConsecutiveX4
member.summary: Interrupt status is updated if 4 consecutive threshold judgments are the same.

member.name: F:BH1745Driver.InterruptPersistence.UpdateConsecutiveX8
member.summary: Interrupt status is updated if 8 consecutive threshold judgments are the same.

member.summary: Represents the interrupt source which is one of the 4 color channels of the Bh1745.
